Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 111th/Halsted
ShortDescription: Southbound 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near Halsted/115th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/115th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/115th due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th.

Northbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses temp. rerouted NB: 115th, Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th SB: 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th: near 115th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Halsted, due to street blockage near115th/Halsted.

Northbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a RAISED BRIDGE at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
